para.text: Along with subscribing to feeds, RSS Bandit supports subscribing to USENET newsgroups via NNTP. Newsgroups are a natural complement to subscribing to blogs.
The first step in subscribing to a newsgroup is to configure a news server. Under the

para.text: option in the tree view. This allows you to configure the Server Port Number, whether or not it requires SSL, and a timeout as in figure 4.
